meanings.definition: A small round wheel with a hole in the center used in sewing to hold thread.
meanings.sent1: I needed more bobbins to finish sewing the buttons on my shirt.
meanings.sent2: Mom asked me to fetch a bobbin from the sewing kit for her.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten played with the bobbins, scattering them all over the floor.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a whirlwind of thoughts, spinning like bobbins on a sewing machine.
meanings.sent5: The bobbins clicked rhythmically as the sewing machine hummed along.
